about_the_game:
Unified is a short, 2,596 word kinetic (linear, no choices) visual novel about universal consciousness. Everything is connected via a conscious intelligence that runs the universe. It's about dropping the ego - the idea of being a person itself.

There is political, religious, and other unsavory topics too. The writing is not typical. There are functionally no characters in this story. You'll probably laugh at some point but the novel is mostly serious in tone.

Features:
• 20-30 min maximum reading time
• Absolutely no choices to be made
• 16 Drawings made using vectors
• Gummy Worms

content_descriptors.notes: Murder, blood, light descriptions of gore, suggestive logos
